casebody.data:
RME MANAGEMENT, LLC
v.
CHAPEL H.O.M. ASSOCIATES, LLC and Chapel Hill Motel Enterprises, Inc. No. 61P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Patricia P. Shields, Attorney at Law, James R. Baker, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for RME Management, LLC. D. Kyle Deak, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Ashley H. Story, Attorney at Law, for Chapel H.O.M. Associates, LLC, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of February 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
